# Assignment 3: Cleaning up according to the Guerrilla analytics framework.

This was the third assignment for our portfolio. We had to apply the Guerrilla analytics framework to our DAUR2 folder.

```{r setup3, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
# Install.packages("fs")
library(fs)
```

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
dir_info(recurse = TRUE) %>%
  filter(type == "file", permissions == "u+r", size > "100KB") %>% ##not sure abt size
  arrange(desc(size)) %>%
  select(path, permissions, size, modification_time)
```

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
dir_ls(regexp = "Daur2") %>% dir_info(recurse = TRUE) %>%
  group_by(directory = path_dir(path)) %>%
  tally(wt = NULL, sort = TRUE) ##wt kan ook size zijn, maar nog niet uit.
```
